members.name: getAttributes
members.comment: Return the attributes for this tag.

return: the AttributeSet for this tag, or null if none can be found

members.name: getStartOffset
members.comment: Returns the start of the range for which the current occurrence of the tag is defined and has the same attributes.

return: the start of the range, or -1 if it can't be found

members.name: getEndOffset
members.comment: Returns the end of the range for which the current occurrence of the tag is defined and has the same attributes.

members.name: next
members.comment: Move the iterator forward to the next occurrence of the tag it represents.

members.name: isValid
members.comment: Indicates if the iterator is currently representing an occurrence of a tag. If false there are no more tags for this iterator.

return: true if the iterator is currently representing an occurrence of a tag, otherwise returns false

members.name: getTag
members.comment: Type of tag this iterator represents.

name: javax.swing.text.html.HTMLDocument$Iterator
comment: An iterator to iterate over a particular type of tag. The iterator is not thread safe. If reliable access to the document is not already ensured by the context under which the iterator is being used, its use should be performed under the protection of Document.render.
